# set up

```{r}
#| label: set up chunk
#| message: false
#reading in packages 
library(tidyverse) #general use for data wrangling, cleaning, etc. 
library(lterdatasampler) #package with LTER datasets 

data(pie_crab) #extracting pie_crab dataset from LTER datasampler
```

# Exploratory visualization 

```{r}
#| label: latitude size plot
#| message: false
ggplot(data = pie_crab, #dataset to plot
       aes(x = latitude, #x-axis is latitude
           y = size, #y-axis is crab size
           color = site)) + #color by site
  geom_point() + #creating a scatterplot 
  theme_minimal() + #using a different theme
  scale_color_viridis_d( #color sites with colors
  )
```
